member.name: T:XSSocket.Models.Settings
member.summary: Represents Application Settings

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.VersionNumber
member.summary: Version Number

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.KeyboardSoundpackName
member.summary: Name of the currently loaded Keyboard sound pack

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.KeyboardSoundpackIndex
member.summary: Index to the currently loaded keyboard sound pack

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.ForceJISKeyboard
member.summary: When enabled, the keyboard is forced into JIS layout

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.KeyboardFormat
member.summary: Format of keyboard (minimal, half size, full)

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.KeyboardOpacity
member.summary: The opacity of the keyboard, between 0 and 1

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.KeyboardTypingSounds
member.summary: When enabled, the keyboard typing noises are on

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.WristOffsets
member.summary: Represents the wrist overlay position in local space. This is relative to the device it's attached to.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.WristRotation
member.summary: Represents the wrist overlay rotation, in euler angles, in local space. This is relative to the device it's attached to.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.WristScale
member.summary: Wrist overlay scale

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.DominantHand
member.summary: Dominant Hand. This would be left (0) or right (1).

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.Language
member.summary: Index of the currently selected language.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.LanguageURL
member.summary: The path to the currently selected language on the system

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.InputMethod
member.summary: Represents the input method of cursor when interacting with devices. This would be touch (0) or mouse emulation (1).

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.AutomaticMouseControl
member.summary: When enabled, the mouse cursor automatically moves with the VR Cursor, or if an input is required first.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.DoubleClickDelay
member.summary: Represents the amount of time in milliseconds after a click that the cursor will freeze in place to allow for easier double-clicking.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.DiscordRichPresence
member.summary: When enabled, XSOverlay will communicate to discord what you are playing.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.LowBatterySound
member.summary: When enabled, XSOverlay will play a sound when the battery is low.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.LowBatteryWarningPercent
member.summary: Represents the threshold of battery percentage that will trigger a low battery warning. This is between 0 and 100.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.HapticsStrength
member.summary: Represents the haptics strength when interacting with XSOverlay. This is between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.HideTooltips
member.summary: When enabled, this hides tooltips.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.PointerScale
member.summary: Represents the scale of the pointer. This is between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.CaptureMethod
member.summary: Represents the capture method of the overlay. This is either Windows Game Capture (0) or BitBlt (1).

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.ShowWindowPreviews
member.summary: When enabled, this will show previews of the windows.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.CurvedOverlays
member.summary: When enabled, this allows overlay windows to be curved.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.AutoRecenter
member.summary: When enabled, XSOverlay will automatically re-center when layout mode opens.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.InvertScaleGesture
member.summary: When enabled, this will invert the scaling direction when scaling the overlay.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.OverlayCurveBias
member.summary: Represents the control strength of the overlay curving.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.OverlayClipAngle
member.summary: Represents the clip angle to auto-hide overlays when not looking at them. Auto-hide must be enabled for this to work.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.OverlayDefaultScale
member.summary: Represents the default scale of the overlay when it is created. This is between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.OverlayDefaultOpacity
member.summary: Represents the default opacity of the overlay when it is created. This is between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.OverlayDefaultMinFPS
member.summary: Represents the default minimum FPS of a newly created overlay overlay.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.OverlayDefaultMaxFPS
member.summary: Represents the default maximum FPS of a newly created overlay overlay.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.AimTarget
member.summary: Represents the target an overlay will aim at when holding it. This could be mixed (0), head (1), or hand (2). AimAtTarget must be enabled for this to work.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.AimAtTarget
member.summary: When enabled, this will aim the overlay at the target when holding it.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.GrabSensitivity
member.summary: Represents the sensitivity of the grab gesture. This is between 0 (light) and 1 (hard).

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.PushSpeed
member.summary: Represents the speed of pushing/pulling an overlay. This is between 0 (slow) and 1 (fast).

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.ScaleSpeed
member.summary: Represents the speed of scaling an overlay. This is between 0 (slow) and 1 (fast).

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.PositionDampening
member.summary: Represents the reaction speed when an overlay adjusts it's position when moving around. This is between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.RotationDampening
member.summary: Represents the reaction speed when an overlay adjusts it's position when moving around. This is between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.SmartRollAngle
member.summary: Represents the angle your head needs relative to the space overlay to to adapt to being sideways. (I.E. For Laying down)

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.AllowWristMovement
member.summary: When enabled, this will allow the wrist overlay to be moved.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.HideWristOverlay
member.summary: When enabled, this will allow the wrist overlay to be hidden.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.WristOpacity
member.summary: Represents the opacity of the wrist overlay. This is between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.WristClipAngle
member.summary: Represents the clip angle to auto-hide the wrist overlay when not looking at it.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.ContinentalTimeFormat
member.summary: When enabled, the time format will be in 24 hour format.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.DateFormat
member.summary: Represents the date format. This could be MM/DD/YYYY (0), DD/MM/YYYY (1)

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.AutoMediaDetection
member.summary: When enabled, XSOverlay will automatically detect media playing.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.MediaThemeing
member.summary: When enabled, XSOverlay will adjust the theme based on the playing media's album art.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.AlwaysShowDetailedInformation
member.summary: When enabled, the wrist battery widget will always show battery percentage and time remaining.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.DefaultShowBatteryPercentage
member.summary: When enabled, the wrist battery widget will always show battery percentage instead of time remaining.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.BatteryFontScale
member.summary: Represents the font-size for the battery widget.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.UseDarkTheme
member.summary: When enabled, XSOverlay will use the dark theme.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.AdaptiveColor
member.summary: Represents how much mix the accent color into the primary theme color. This is between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.AccentColor
member.summary: Represents the theme accent color.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.NotificationScale
member.summary: Represents the notification scale. This is between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.NotificationOffsets
member.summary: Represents the notification offset relative to local space to the hmd.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.ForceHigherQualityOverlays
member.summary: When enabled, this will force overlays to be rendered at a higher resolution.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.BlockInputToBackgroundApplication
member.summary: When enabled, XSOverlay will attempt to block input to the background application.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.InputBlockingBehavior
member.summary: Represents the input blocking behavior. Chose between 'blocking when layout mode is open' (0) or 'blocking when hovering over an overlay' (1).

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.NightLight
member.summary: Represents the behavior of the night-light which can apply a red-ish hue to the overlays during select hours (true) or all time (false).

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.NightLightStartHour
member.summary: Represents the starting hour of the night light cycle.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.NightLightEndHour
member.summary: Represents the ending hour of the night light cycle.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.NightLightStartAMPM
member.summary: When enabled, the night light cycle will start at PM, otherwise it will start at AM.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.NightLightEndAMPM
member.summary: When enabled, the night light cycle will end at PM, otherwise it will start at AM.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.NightLightIntensity
member.summary: Represents the intensity of the night light. This is between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.NightLightSchedule
member.summary: When enabled, the night light will follow a schedule.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.AllowAdminPermissions
member.summary: When enabled, XSOverlay will be granted admin permissions.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.UUID
member.summary: UUID of the user. This is an anonymous identifier used for analytics.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.Settings.SendAnalytics
member.summary: When enabled, the anonymous analytics will be sent.

member.name: T:XSSocket.Models.SystemInfo
member.summary: Represents the system information of the system.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.SystemInfo.CPU
member.summary: Represents the CPU of the system.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.SystemInfo.GPU
member.summary: Represents the GPU of the system.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.SystemInfo.Memory
member.summary: Represents the RAM of the system.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.SystemInfo.Frametime
member.summary: Current time in ms between the previous frame and this frame.

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.SystemInfo.Framerate
member.summary: Current framerate in Frames Per Second

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.SystemInfo.MaxFrametime
member.summary: Maximum frame-time based on Headset Refresh Rate in ms e.g. 90hz = 11.1ms

member.name: P:XSSocket.Models.SystemInfo.MaxFramerate
member.summary: Represents the maximum framerate based on Headset Refresh Rate in Frames Per Second e.g. 90hz = 90fps

member.summary: Represents the wrist overlay position in local space, relative to the device it's attached to.

member.name: M:XSSocket.Models.XSSettingObject.#ctor(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Represents a setting object that can be sent to the client. More details. Setting value cannot be null.

member.summary: Toggles layout mode on or off.

member.summary: Toggles performance overlay on or off.

member.summary: Creates an overlay

member.summary: Re-centers the overlay space.

member.summary: Summons / dismisses the keyboard.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.Layouts
member.summary: Summons / dismisses the layout folder.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.Settings
member.summary: Summons / dismisses settings panel.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.DeleteAll
member.summary: Deletes all active overlays.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.WindowSwitcher
member.summary: Toggles on and off grid view.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.MediaPlayPause
member.summary: Play/Pauses the media player.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.MediaPrevious
member.summary: Goes to the previously played song on the media player.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.MediaNext
member.summary: Skips to the next song on the media player.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.WindowSettings
member.summary: Toggles if the window settings panel is visible.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.WindowSelect
member.summary: Toggles if the window select panel is visible.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.WindowDelete
member.summary: Deletes the overlay that has ownership of the window toolbar.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.UpdateMediaPlayerInformation(XSSocket.Models.XSMediaPlayerObject)
member.summary: Updates the media player information. is the object that contains the information about the media player.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.SetXSOverlaySystemSetting(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a user settings. More details.. Represents the setting name. Represents how the setting should be altered. Value cannot be null.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.SetXSOverlaySystemSetting(XSSocket.Models.XSSettingObject)
member.summary: Sets a user settings. More details.. Represents the setting that should be changed and how it should be altered. Setting value cannot be null.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.SetActiveOverlaySetting(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a setting on the currently active overlay. More details.. Represents the setting name. Represents how the setting should be altered. Value cannot be null.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.SetActiveOverlaySetting(XSSocket.Models.XSSettingObject)
member.summary: Sets a setting on the currently active overlay. More details.. Represents the setting that should be changed and how it should be altered. Setting value cannot be null.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestShowTooltip
member.summary: Requests to show a tooltip.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.PlayDeviceHaptics(XSSocket.Models.XSHapticsObject)
member.summary: Allows you to play haptic feedback on a device. is the object that contains the information about the haptics.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.OpenSteamVRBindings
member.summary: Opens the SteamVR Binding Dashboard Page for XSO.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.SendNotification(XSSocket.Models.XSNotificationObject)
member.summary: Sends a notificationObject to the overlay. The object that contains the information about the notification.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestUpdateCursorCollisionTexture(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Requests that the collision area for the panel be updated. Prevents cursor being visible on transparent parts of UI. May not update instantly. The id of the overlay to update.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestUpdateCursorCollisionTexture(System.UInt64,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Requests that the canvas resolution for the overlay be updated to the requested resolution. May not update instantly. the id of the overlay to update. The width of the window. The height of the window.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestUpdateCursorCollisionTexture(System.UInt64,XSSocket.Models.CanvasSize)
member.summary: Requests that the canvas resolution for the overlay be updated to the requested resolution. May not update instantly. The id of the overlay to update. The dimensions of the window.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.SubscribeToEvents(System.Collections.Generic.List{XSSocket.XSSubscriptionTag})
member.summary: Subscribes to events from the overlay based on the list provided. The list of subscription tags to subscribe to. If empty, subscribes to all events.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.UnsubscribeToEvents(System.Collections.Generic.List{XSSocket.XSSubscriptionTag})
member.summary: Unsubscribes to events from the overlay based on the list provided. The list of subscription tags to subscribe to. If empty, unsubscribes to all events.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestDateTime
member.summary: Returns the current date and time, including session length, formatted based on User Setting.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestThemeUpdate
member.summary: Returns the current theme colors in hexadecimal format.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestSteamAvatar(System.Nullable{XSSocket.Models.AvatarSize})
member.summary: Returns the steam avatar of the user. Represents the requested size of the avatar image. If nothing is submitted the size of the image is 'medium'.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestDeviceInformation
member.summary: Returns a list of devices and information about those devices.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestLayoutModeState
member.summary: Returns the current open / closed state of Layout Mode.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestMediaPlayerUpdate
member.summary: Returns the current media information.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestGetSettings
member.summary: Returns user settings for the overlay.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestUpdatedLanguageList
member.summary: Returns the list of possible languages.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestUpdatedLanguageMap
member.summary: Returns the map of strings for the currently selected language.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestAchievementInformation
member.summary: Returns list of achievements with a boolean for unlocked / locked for the user.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestWindowList
member.summary: Returns a list of windows that can be captured.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestActiveOverlayInformation
member.summary: Requests the current active overlay. This is the overlay that has ownership of the window toolbar.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestRuntimePerformance
member.summary: Requests information about system resource usage, such as CPU, GPU, and Memory.

member.name: M:XSSocket.XSSocket.RequestOverlayIDs
member.summary: Requests the lists of overlays and their ids.
